body:
Well i was banned in August for being an idiot aka (Excessive Interactions) and I was actually nice to players before this July. I just got really mad at people for being mean, insulting me and being to good that it looks like they hack. When I got mad, I would get mad for like the whole day so I would spam, annoy mods, and other weird stuff. So I was just wonder if people want be back if I can control myself, or if I should get lost out of there lives.

Thanks <3

PS: Mods/Staff: I don't know if posts like this are allowed but if they arent please just simply tell me in the chat so I know later on.

title: Should I Apeal? Who wants me bak?

replies.body: Im not appealing. Just asking people if i SHOULD APPEAL.
replies.body_tagged: Im not appealing. Just asking people if i SHOULD APPEAL.

replies.body: If you have 17 chat infractions, you deserve the ban... but it's up to you.
replies.body_tagged: If you have 17 chat infractions, you deserve the ban... but it's up to you.

replies.body: Well you were blatantly spamming the same message 3 times every time you would say something, not to mention the multiple infractions, you don't need to ask us if "we want you back"
replies.body_tagged: Well you were blatantly spamming the same message 3 times every time you would say something, not to mention the multiple infractions, you don't need to ask us if "we want you back"

replies.body: So you spammed to "annoy mods" and now you ask if anyone wants you back? I think you answered your own question.
replies.body_tagged: So you spammed to "annoy mods" and now you ask if anyone wants you back? I think you answered your own question.

replies.body: KK thanks for the info, Ill get lost, like ive been doing to everyone in my life for the past 5 months. GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG

replies.body: Yeah, make that a forum ban as well too. This is very immature.
